data: “If a female figure in a white shroud enters your bedchamber at midnight on the thirteenth day of this month, answer this letter; otherwise, do not.”
midnight | thirteenth day of this month
Burroughs, Edgar Rice, 1875-1950; Krenkel, Roy G., 1918-1983 [Illustrator]
